channel.title: Nowildme command? Can I plz have?
channel.description: anybody have the ::nowildme command? I saw it on this one server where u can make it so people can't kill you in wild (admin only). Anybody have it that I can please have?

item.title: Nowildme command? Can I plz have?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“bluurr, post:2, topic:88860”]i got this whice turn all pking off but i cant remmber the code for it been on just 1 player

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvpoff") && playerRights >= 3) { try { if(wildyoff == 0) { wildyoff = 1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pvp mode is now off"; } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Pvp mode is already turned off"); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvpon") && playerRights >= 3) { try { if(wildyoff == 1) { wildyoff = 0; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pvp mode is now on"; } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Pvp mode is already turned on"); } } [/quote]

this makes it so it is off for everyone let my try to get ahold of a guy who had it fore everyone seperatly

Read full topic
item.source: Nowildme command? Can I plz have?

item.title: Nowildme command? Can I plz have?
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

i got this whice turn all pking off but i cant remmber the code for it been on just 1 player

      if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvpoff") && playerRights >= 3) {
   try {
       if(wildyoff == 0) {
      wildyoff = 1;
      PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pvp mode is now off";
       }
   } catch(Exception e) {
       sendMessage("Pvp mode is already turned off");
   }
    }
    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvpon") && playerRights >= 3) {
   try {
       if(wildyoff == 1) {
      wildyoff = 0;
      PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Pvp mode is now on";
       }
   } catch(Exception e) {
       sendMessage("Pvp mode is already turned on");
   }
    }
